title: Contemporary Nantong Escape Overlooking Binjiang Park & Yangtze River
description: Discover the vivid history and culture of the 'Pearl of the River and Sea' with a stay at the InterContinental Nantong, an IHG Hotel. Set along the Yangtze River, this modern hotel is the perfect base to wander through Nantong Horticultural Expo Park, explore Langshan or expand your knowledge at one of the many museums. For onsite indulgence, head to the glorious indoor pool or savour a meal at one of four restaurants, including fine dining at West Commune All Day Dining Restaurant or hand-rolled sushi at Hotori Japanese Restaurant.
offer_address: No 508 Yuelong South Road, Nantong, 226004 China
